pages.text: $(bgreen)Snow Pea$() might come off as quite cold, but it really like its friends, and it's good at heating up the whole audience with cold jokes at a party.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)175$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)one snow pea$() every 1.5 seconds to attack and $(baqua)slow down$() enemies.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)serveral snow peas each tick$() which last 5 seconds.
